Global

Methods

afterSend(data, frame, dataCheck)

This function is called when the a payload is send successfully

Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object

the data which was send
frame Array.<Number>

the payload that was transmitted
dataCheck Object

the data object parsed from payload

afterSendCmd(cmd, cmdObj)

This function is called when the a command is send successfully

Parameters:
Name Type Description
cmd String

the cmd which was send
cmdObj Object

the cmd object which was send

getEmptyCapabilitiesObject() → {Object}

This function returns an object with all capability keys assigned to "undefined" This can be used to clear a deviceData object from capability keys before assigning the real capability key to send

Returns:

result

Type
Object

getSendOptionsForData(data, options) → {Object}

This function is called in this.send just after the send data is computed. This function can be used to add custom send options depending on the data object that will be send. This could be a custom signal object or a custom amount of repetitions

Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object

The data object that is to be send
options Object

The current options object
Returns:

options The new Options object to be used to send the given data

Type
Object

onFlowActionFrameSend(args) → {Promise}

Default flow implementation function for rfdriver.send. Sends the args object.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
args
Returns:

result

Type
Promise

onFlowActionSendCmd(args) → {Promise}

Default flow implementation function for rfdriver.send_cmd. Sends the cmd in the args object.

args
Returns:

result

Promise

onFlowActionSendCmdNumber(args) → {Promise}

Default flow implementation function for rfdriver.send_cmd_number. Sends the cmds for each digit of the given number.

onFlowTriggerFrameReceived(args, state) → {Promise}

Default flow implementation function for rfdriver.received. Checks if keys in args match the keys in device state.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
args
state
Returns:

result

Type
Promise

onSend(data, payload, frame)

This function is called when the 'send' event is emitted The default implementation will emit the 'send_pair' event with the frame argument. If you want to manipulate This data before the event is triggered you can do so here.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object

the data to be send
payload Array.<Number>

the payload that will be transmitted
frame Object

the data object parsed from payload

triggerFlowsOnCmd(cmdObj)

This function triggers default flows and is called from the onCmd function

Parameters:
Name Type Description
cmdObj Object

The new cmdObj received for the device that could trigger a flow.

triggerFlowsOnData(data)

This function triggers default flows and is called from the onData function

Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object

The new data received for the device that could trigger a flow.

Type Definitions

cmdObj

An object parsed from a command id to access the cmd, type and subtype of the command

Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Attributes Description
cmdObj.id Object

The full id of the command e.g. 'beamer~$onoff$~4k_versions
cmdObj.cmd Object

The command key e.g. 'onoff'
cmdObj.type Object <optional>

The type of the command e.g. 'beamer'
cmdObj.subtype Object <optional>

The subtype of the command e.g. '4k_versions'
